description: Everything we need to do before taking over production of the <Division> division

subtasks.description: If their master database is not deemed suitable, make a new one with the {{ensembl-compara/scripts/production/make_a_master.sh}} script
subtasks.summary: Creation of a new master database

subtasks.description: Make sure the master database is complete and sane
Find the last production databases they used, and copy them on our server
Also check that the whole-genome alignments are in the range of their mlss_id
subtasks.summary: Copy and healthcheck the last release database

subtasks.description: With the help of the <Division> team, identify the patterns of whole-genome alignments and encode the rules in a new XML configuration file. Add the extra analyses such as protein-trees
subtasks.summary: Write an XML configuration file for the division

subtasks.description: e.g. LastZ parameters used for which clades, whether they run CAFE or not, etc
subtasks.summary: Gather specific parameters used by the <Division> team

subtasks.description: It is likely that not all species have been aligned to the right species. create_all_mlss.pl will create the missing MethodLinkSpeciesSets. Those alignments will have to be run for the first production cycle but can often be started earlier
subtasks.summary: Run create_all_mlss.pl and schedule the missing LastZ alignments
